TextView.android:text: The minerals in the museum have been lent to us from Broward College's own collection. There is a diverse assortment ranging from commonly know minerals to lesser known ones. The boneyard has cases of ammonites as well as bone and egg casts. Towards the back there is a 3-D model of a habitat setting along with some dinosaur models. Credits: The app was made by Lindsey Berkowitz, Piero Salini, and Savion Mercedes, in addition to assistance from FAU teachers for the Museum of Discovery and Science in Ft. Lauderdale, Florida. We would like to thank the Museum of Discovery and Science for giving us the opportunity to help in the development of their app as well as FAU for teaching us the class and sharing their campus.
